# Languages {.unnumbered}

The language table by langID.


```{r, echo=FALSE}
# @RUSTY replace to use excel directly
main_db <-
  DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "../data/tables/main.sqlite")
quary <-
  paste("SELECT", "*", "FROM", "languages", "ORDER BY langID")
languages_table <- DBI::dbGetQuery(main_db, quary)

output_string <- ""

# Loop over rows and create outputs per row
for (row_index in 1:nrow(languages_table)) {
  working_row <- languages_table[row_index,]
  
  nat_name <- working_row$natName
  lang_ID <- working_row$langID
  lang_fam <- working_row$langFam
  lang_name <- working_row$langName
  code_1 <- working_row$ISO6391
  code_2 <- working_row$ISO6392B
  code_3 <- working_row$ISO6392T
  code_4 <- working_row$ISO6393
  code_5 <- working_row$ISO6396
  
  # Check for not empty values
  # @RUSTY consider functioning out checks for length
  if (length(nat_name) < 1) {
    nat_name <- "Native Name is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(lang_ID) < 1) {
    lang_ID <- "Language ID is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(lang_fam) < 1) {
    lang_fam <- "Language Family is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(lang_name) < 1) {
    lang_name <- "Language Name is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(code_1) < 1) {
    code_1 <- "ISO639-1 code is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(code_2) < 1) {
    code_2 <- "ISO639-2B code is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(code_3) < 1) {
    code_3 <- "ISO639-2T code is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(code_4) < 1) {
    code_4 <- "ISO639-3 code is missing at the momment"
  }
  if (length(code_5) < 1) {
    code_5 <- "ISO639-6 code is missing at the momment"
  }
  
  # Construct the print 
  output_string <- glue::glue('{output_string}
  
                              # {nat_name}({lang_ID})
                              Language Family: {lang_fam}  
                              Language name: {lang_name}  
                              ISO639-1 code: {code_1} 
                              ISO639-2B code: {code_2} 	
                              ISO639-2T code:	{code_3}  
                              ISO639-3 code: {code_4} 	
                              ISO639-6 code: {code_5}')
}


```
`r output_string`
